entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
